main event: A light was observed in the sky near Beaufort, South Carolina on May 16, 1963.
interesting points: The light began changing reflections as though it was surrounded by a revolving shroud or mantle.
The light slowly drifted across the line of vision, disappearing behind clouds but its reflective lights remained visible.
The object did not appear to change its elevation during the 15-minute observation.
The apparent size of the object was estimated to be about the size of a passenger airliner.
The object was in view for about 10-15 minutes and was seen by several witnesses.
